name: Credit Note List
query:
SELECT  si.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
        si.name as "Credit Note No:Link/Sales Invoice:150",
        si.base_net_total as "Amount Excl. Vat:Currency:120",
        si.base_total_taxes_and_charges as "Vat:Currency:120",
        si.base_total as "Total Amount:Currency:120",
        si.return_against as "Corresponding Invoice No:Link/Sales Invoice:150",
        si2.posting_date as "Invoice Date:Date:80",
        si2.base_net_total as "Invoice Amount Excl. VAT:Currency:120",
        si2.base_total_taxes_and_charges as "Invoice VAT Amount:Currency:120",
        si2.base_total as "Invoice Amount Excl. VAT:Currency:120",
        si.company as "Company:Link/Company:150",
        cmp.tax_id as "TIN:Data:0"
FROM `tabSales Invoice` si  left join `tabSales Invoice` si2 on si.return_against = si2.name
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabCompany` cmp ON si.company = cmp.name 
WHERE si.status = 'Return'
AND si.is_return = 1
AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
